Title: Bubble Craze
Description:
<Agrikus shouts at you.> I have no more poppy tea!

...Oh, you're not one of them. Praise the Titans. Someone made "Bubble Poppy Tea" the most fashionable drink on the market this week and I've sold out of the herb completely. Please, could you bring more poppies before they return in droves?
ObjectivesText: Gather 8 Bubble Poppies for Agrikus in Valdrakken.
